item.title: My Music Player
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

Hello, here is my music player:

[code]

::::::::::::: Choose Your Song Here ::::::::::::: <?php $nameofdir = "music/"; $domain = $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']; $dir = opendir($nameofdir);

while (($file = readdir($dir)) !== false)
{
if (strpos($file, ‘.mp3’) !== false) {
$name = str_replace(’.mp3’, ’ ‘, $file);
$files = str_replace(" ", “%20”, $file);
echo ‘’.$name.’’."\n"; }
}
?>



[/code]

Is it possible to make that read music from links instead of files in a directory, I’ve been moving it around and I get errors.

Thanks.

Read full topic
